text:
@JohnRLottJr @chuckwoolery Somebody that works in a hospital in LA said they have 900 beds, they save 400 beds for Covid-19 patients and after only using 10% of those 400 beds. They’ve started to book regular surgeries and see patients again!!
Covid-19 is a fraud

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
